isNotEmpty.isEqual: (a.zt = '6' or a.zt='7' or a.zt='4' or a.zt='5' or a.zt='12' or a.zt='13')

sqlMap.select:
select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from (select a.xzdxzqh xzdxzqh,a.xzdxzqhdm xzdxzqhdm,a.qyid qyid,a.ryid ryid,a.hylbdm hylbdm,a.hylb hylb,a.cyrybh cyrybh,a.cyrylbdm cyrylbdm,a.cyrylbmc cyrylbmc,a.xm xm,a.qm qm,a.bm bm,a.xmpy xmpy,a.gjdm gjdm,a.gj gj,a.mzdm mzdm,a.minzu minzu,a.xbdm xbdm,a.xb xb,a.csrq csrq,a.hyzkdm hyzkdm,a.hyzk hyzk,a.shengao shengao,a.tizh tizh,a.hjdxzqh hjdxzqh,a.hjdxzqhdm hjdxzqhdm,a.hjdxz hjdxz,a.cyzjdm cyzjdm,a.cyzj cyzj,a.zjhm zjhm,a.zzzhm zzzhm,a.zzdz zzdz,a.gwbh gwbh,a.gwmc gwmc,a.gwzrms gwzrms,a.shouji shouji,a.lxdh lxdh,a.jjlxr jjlxr,a.jjlxrdh jjlxrdh,a.gzdm gzdm,a.gz gz,a.zhiwu zhiwu,a.rzrq rzrq,a.cyryztdm cyryztdm,a.cyryzt cyryzt,a.zxr zxr,a.zxbz zxbz,a.zxsj zxsj,a.lrsj lrsj,a.lrr lrr,a.lrdwbm lrdwbm,a.lrdwmc lrdwmc,a.hcdw hcdw,a.hcr hcr,a.hcsj hcsj,a.zxyy zxyy,a.zkzt zkzt,a.bcsj bcsj,a.dcbs dcbs,a.bz bz,a.scbz scbz,a.biduiflag biduiflag,a.zpwtgyy zpwtgyy,a.zt zt ,b.qymc ,b.qybm,a.lzrq,a.xxdm,a.xx,a.whcd,a.whcddm from t_qyryxx a ,t_qyjbxx b where 1=1 and a.qyid=b.qyid and a.scbz=0 and a.zxbz='0' and b.scbz=0 and a.cyrylbdm='0'
order by $pageSort$) z) x where rowno >$beginRow$ and rowno <= $endRow$
select count(1) a from t_qyryxx a ,t_qyjbxx b where 1=1 and a.qyid=b.qyid and a.scbz=0 and a.zxbz='0' and b.scbz=0 and a.cyrylbdm='0'

select a.xzdxzqh xzdxzqh,a.xzdxzqhdm xzdxzqhdm,a.qyid qyid,a.ryid ryid,a.hylbdm hylbdm,a.hylb hylb,a.cyrybh cyrybh,a.cyrylbdm cyrylbdm,a.cyrylbmc cyrylbmc,a.xm xm,a.qm qm,a.bm bm,a.xmpy xmpy,a.gjdm gjdm,a.gj gj,a.mzdm mzdm,a.minzu minzu,a.xbdm xbdm,a.xb xb,a.csrq csrq,a.hyzkdm hyzkdm,a.hyzk hyzk,a.shengao shengao,a.tizh tizh,a.hjdxzqh hjdxzqh,a.hjdxzqhdm hjdxzqhdm,a.hjdxz hjdxz,a.cyzjdm cyzjdm,a.cyzj cyzj,a.zjhm zjhm,a.zzzhm zzzhm,a.zzdz zzdz,a.gwbh gwbh,a.gwmc gwmc,a.gwzrms gwzrms,a.shouji shouji,a.lxdh lxdh,a.jjlxr jjlxr,a.jjlxrdh jjlxrdh,a.gzdm gzdm,a.gz gz,a.zhiwu zhiwu,a.rzrq rzrq,a.cyryztdm cyryztdm,a.cyryzt cyryzt,a.zxr zxr,a.zxbz zxbz,a.zxsj zxsj,a.lrsj lrsj,a.lrr lrr,a.lrdwbm lrdwbm,a.lrdwmc lrdwmc,a.hcdw hcdw,a.hcr hcr,a.hcsj hcsj,a.zxyy zxyy,a.zkzt zkzt,a.bcsj bcsj,a.dcbs dcbs,a.bz bz,a.scbz scbz,a.biduiflag biduiflag,a.zpwtgyy zpwtgyy,a.zt zt ,b.qymc ,b.qybm ,a.lzrq ,a.xxdm,a.xx ,a.whcd,a.whcddm from t_qyryxx a ,t_qyjbxx b where 1=1 and a.qyid=b.qyid and a.scbz=0
a.cylbdm =#cylbdm#
order by a.qyid desc,a.ryid desc

select a.xzdxzqh xzdxzqh,a.xzdxzqhdm xzdxzqhdm,a.qyid qyid,a.ryid ryid,a.hylbdm hylbdm,a.hylb hylb,a.cyrybh cyrybh,a.cyrylbdm cyrylbdm,a.cyrylbmc cyrylbmc,a.xm xm,a.qm qm,a.bm bm,a.xmpy xmpy,a.gjdm gjdm,a.gj gj,a.mzdm mzdm,a.minzu minzu,a.xbdm xbdm,a.xb xb,a.csrq csrq,a.hyzkdm hyzkdm,a.hyzk hyzk,a.shengao shengao,a.tizh tizh,a.hjdxzqh hjdxzqh,a.hjdxzqhdm hjdxzqhdm,a.hjdxz hjdxz,a.cyzjdm cyzjdm,a.cyzj cyzj,a.zjhm zjhm,a.zzzhm zzzhm,a.zzdz zzdz,a.gwbh gwbh,a.gwmc gwmc,a.gwzrms gwzrms,a.shouji shouji,a.lxdh lxdh,a.jjlxr jjlxr,a.jjlxrdh jjlxrdh,a.gzdm gzdm,a.gz gz,a.zhiwu zhiwu,a.rzrq rzrq,a.cyryztdm cyryztdm,a.cyryzt cyryzt,a.zxr zxr,a.zxbz zxbz,a.zxsj zxsj,a.lrsj lrsj,a.lrr lrr,a.lrdwbm lrdwbm,a.lrdwmc lrdwmc,a.hcdw hcdw,a.hcr hcr,a.hcsj hcsj,a.zxyy zxyy,a.zkzt zkzt,a.bcsj bcsj,a.dcbs dcbs,a.bz bz,a.scbz scbz,a.biduiflag biduiflag,a.zpwtgyy zpwtgyy,a.zt zt,a.yjbz yjbz,a.yjsj yjsj ,b.qymc,b.qybm ,a.lzrq , a.xxdm,a.xx ,a.whcd,a.whcddm , a.cylbdm , a.cylb,a.djrq,a.hjlbdm,a.hjlbmc,a.zzmmdm,a.zzmmmc from t_qyryxx a ,t_qyjbxx b where a.qyid=b.qyid
a.scbz=1
a.scbz=0
a.scbz=0

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from (select a.ryid ryid, a.qyid qyid, a.cyrybh cyrybh, a.cyrylbdm cyrylbdm, a.xm xm, a.xbdm xbdm, a.xb xb, a.zjhm zjhm, a.cylb cylb, a.cylbdm cylbdm, a.zt zt, a.lrsj lrsj, b.qybm qybm, b.qymc qymc, b.zt bz from t_qyryxx a, t_qyjbxx b, (select ryid from t_qyry_zp where tplx = '0' and tpnr is not null) c, t_wgcyryxx d where 1 = 1 and a.qyid = b.qyid and a.ryid = c.ryid and a.ryid = d.ryid(+) and a.scbz = 0 and a.zxbz = '0' and b.zt !='0'
a.xm like '%$xm$%'
d.ywx like '%$ywx$%'
d.ywm like '%$ywm$%'
b.qybm like '%$qybm$%'
b.qymc like '%$qymc$%'
a.xbdm =#xbdm#
a.cyrybh =#cyrybh#
a.cylbdm like '$cylbdm$%'
a.zt =#zt#
a.lrsj >=#lrsjf:DATE#
a.lrsj < #lrsjt:DATE#+1
a.cyzjdm =#cyzjdm#
a.hylbdm =#hylbdm#
a.zjhm like '%$zjhm$%'
a.lrdwbm =#lrdwbm#
and a.zt in ('0','3') order by $pageSort$) z) x where rowno >$beginRow$ and rowno <= $endRow$

select count(1) a from t_qyryxx a, t_qyjbxx b, (select ryid from t_qyry_zp where tplx = '0' and tpnr is not null) c, t_wgcyryxx d where 1 = 1 and a.qyid = b.qyid and a.ryid = c.ryid and a.ryid = d.ryid(+) and a.scbz = 0 and a.zxbz = '0' and b.zt !='0'
a.xm like '%$xm$%'
d.ywx like '%$ywx$%'
d.ywm like '%$ywm$%'
b.qybm like '%$qybm$%'
b.qymc like '%$qymc$%'
a.xbdm =#xbdm#
a.cyrybh =#cyrybh#
a.cylbdm like '$cylbdm$%'
a.zt =#zt#
a.lrsj >=#lrsjf:DATE#
a.lrsj < #lrsjt:DATE#+1
a.cyzjdm =#cyzjdm#
a.hylbdm =#hylbdm#
a.zjhm like '%$zjhm$%'
a.lrdwbm =#lrdwbm#
and a.zt in ('0','3')

select a.ryid ryid from t_qyryxx a, t_qyjbxx b, (select ryid from t_qyry_zp where tplx = '0' and tpnr is not null) c, t_wgcyryxx d where 1 = 1 and a.qyid = b.qyid and a.ryid = c.ryid and a.ryid = d.ryid(+) and a.scbz = 0 and a.zxbz = '0' and b.zt !='0'
a.xm like '%$xm$%'
d.ywx like '%$ywx$%'
d.ywm like '%$ywm$%'
b.qybm like '%$qybm$%'
b.qymc like '%$qymc$%'
a.xbdm =#xbdm#
a.cyrybh =#cyrybh#
a.cylbdm like '$cylbdm$%'
a.zt =#zt#
a.lrsj >=#lrsjf:DATE#
a.lrsj < #lrsjt:DATE#+1
a.cyzjdm =#cyzjdm#
a.zjhm like '%$zjhm$%'
a.hylbdm =#hylbdm#
a.lrdwbm =#lrdwbm#
and a.zt in ('0','3')
select a.ryid ryid,a.xm xm,a.zjhm zjhm from t_qyryxx a where a.cyrylbdm='0' and a.zt in ('6','7') and a.scbz=0

select a.xzdxzqh xzdxzqh,a.xzdxzqhdm xzdxzqhdm,a.qyid qyid,a.ryid ryid,a.hylbdm hylbdm,a.hylb hylb,a.cyrybh cyrybh,a.cyrylbdm cyrylbdm,a.cyrylbmc cyrylbmc,a.xm xm,a.qm qm,a.bm bm,a.xmpy xmpy,a.gjdm gjdm,a.gj gj,a.mzdm mzdm,a.minzu minzu,a.xbdm xbdm,a.xb xb,a.csrq csrq,a.hyzkdm hyzkdm,a.hyzk hyzk,a.shengao shengao,a.tizh tizh,a.hjdxzqh hjdxzqh,a.hjdxzqhdm hjdxzqhdm,a.hjdxz hjdxz,a.cyzjdm cyzjdm,a.cyzj cyzj,a.zjhm zjhm,a.zzzhm zzzhm,a.zzdz zzdz,a.gwbh gwbh,a.gwmc gwmc,a.gwzrms gwzrms,a.shouji shouji,a.lxdh lxdh,a.jjlxr jjlxr,a.jjlxrdh jjlxrdh,a.gzdm gzdm,a.gz gz,a.zhiwu zhiwu,a.rzrq rzrq,a.cyryztdm cyryztdm,a.cyryzt cyryzt,a.zxr zxr,a.zxbz zxbz,a.zxsj zxsj,a.lrsj lrsj,a.lrr lrr,a.lrdwbm lrdwbm,a.lrdwmc lrdwmc,a.hcdw hcdw,a.hcr hcr,a.hcsj hcsj,a.zxyy zxyy,a.zkzt zkzt,a.bcsj bcsj,a.dcbs dcbs,a.bz bz,a.scbz scbz,a.biduiflag biduiflag,a.zpwtgyy zpwtgyy,a.zt zt ,a.lzrq ,a.xxdm,a.xx ,a.whcd,a.whcddm from t_qyryxx a where a.zjhm = #zjhm# and a.scbz=0 and zxbz='0'
a.ryid <> #ryid#
a.gjdm = #gjdm#
select a.display_name hjdxzqh, a.fact_value hjdxzqhdm from t_dict_item a where a.dict_code = 'dm_xzqh' and a.fact_value = '$zjhm$'

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from (select
a.xzdxzqh xzdxzqh,a.xzdxzqhdm xzdxzqhdm,a.qyid qyid,a.ryid ryid,a.hylbdm hylbdm,a.hylb hylb,a.cyrybh cyrybh,a.cyrylbdm cyrylbdm,a.cyrylbmc cyrylbmc,a.xm xm,a.qm qm,a.bm bm,a.xmpy xmpy,a.gjdm gjdm,a.gj gj,a.mzdm mzdm,a.minzu minzu,a.xbdm xbdm,a.xb xb,a.csrq csrq,a.hyzkdm hyzkdm,a.hyzk hyzk,a.shengao shengao,a.tizh tizh,a.hjdxzqh hjdxzqh,a.hjdxzqhdm hjdxzqhdm,a.hjdxz hjdxz,a.cyzjdm cyzjdm,a.cyzj cyzj,a.zjhm zjhm,a.zzzhm zzzhm,a.zzdz zzdz,a.gwbh gwbh,a.gwmc gwmc,a.gwzrms gwzrms,a.shouji shouji,a.lxdh lxdh,a.jjlxr jjlxr,a.jjlxrdh jjlxrdh,a.gzdm gzdm,a.gz gz,a.zhiwu zhiwu,a.rzrq rzrq,a.cyryztdm cyryztdm,a.cyryzt cyryzt,a.zxr zxr,a.zxbz zxbz,a.zxsj zxsj,a.lrsj lrsj,a.lrr lrr,a.lrdwbm lrdwbm,a.lrdwmc lrdwmc,a.hcdw hcdw,a.hcr hcr,a.hcsj hcsj,a.zxyy zxyy,a.zkzt zkzt,a.bcsj bcsj,a.dcbs dcbs,a.bz bz,a.scbz scbz,a.biduiflag biduiflag,a.zpwtgyy zpwtgyy,a.zt zt
,b.qybm qybm,b.qymc qymc,c.zpid ,a.lzrq ,a.xxdm,a.xx ,a.whcd,a.whcddm ,a.cylb from t_qyryxx a ,t_qyjbxx b,(select ryid,zpid,tpnr from t_qyry_zp where tplx='0') c where a.qyid=b.qyid and a.ryid=c.ryid(+) and a.cyrylbdm='0' and b.scbz=0
order by $pageSort$) z) x where rowno >$beginRow$ and rowno <= $endRow$
select count(1) a from t_qyryxx a ,t_qyjbxx b,(select ryid,zpid,tpnr from t_qyry_zp where tplx='0') c where a.qyid=b.qyid and a.ryid=c.ryid(+) and a.cyrylbdm='0' and b.scbz=0

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from (select a.xzdxzqh xzdxzqh,a.xzdxzqhdm xzdxzqhdm,a.qyid qyid,a.ryid ryid,a.hylbdm hylbdm,a.hylb hylb,a.cyrybh cyrybh,a.cyrylbdm cyrylbdm,a.cyrylbmc cyrylbmc,a.xm xm,a.qm qm,a.bm bm,a.xmpy xmpy,a.gjdm gjdm,a.gj gj,a.mzdm mzdm,a.minzu minzu,a.xbdm xbdm,a.xb xb,a.csrq csrq,a.hyzkdm hyzkdm,a.hyzk hyzk,a.shengao shengao,a.tizh tizh,a.hjdxzqh hjdxzqh,a.hjdxzqhdm hjdxzqhdm,a.hjdxz hjdxz,a.cyzjdm cyzjdm,a.cyzj cyzj,a.zjhm zjhm,a.zzzhm zzzhm,a.zzdz zzdz,a.gwbh gwbh,a.gwmc gwmc,a.gwzrms gwzrms,a.shouji shouji,a.lxdh lxdh,a.jjlxr jjlxr,a.jjlxrdh jjlxrdh,a.gzdm gzdm,a.gz gz,a.zhiwu zhiwu,a.rzrq rzrq,a.cyryztdm cyryztdm,a.cyryzt cyryzt,a.zxr zxr,a.zxbz zxbz,a.zxsj zxsj,a.lrsj lrsj,a.lrr lrr,a.lrdwbm lrdwbm,a.lrdwmc lrdwmc,a.hcdw hcdw,a.hcr hcr,a.hcsj hcsj,a.zxyy zxyy,a.zkzt zkzt,a.bcsj bcsj,a.dcbs dcbs,a.bz bz,a.scbz scbz,a.biduiflag biduiflag,a.zpwtgyy zpwtgyy,a.zt zt
,b.qybm qybm,b.qymc qymc ,a.lzrq ,a.xxdm,a.xx ,a.whcd,a.whcddm from t_qyryxx a ,t_qyjbxx b where a.qyid=b.qyid and a.cyrylbdm='0' and b.scbz=0 and a.scbz=0
order by $pageSort$) z) x where rowno >$beginRow$ and rowno <= $endRow$
select count(1) a from t_qyryxx a ,t_qyjbxx b where a.qyid=b.qyid and a.cyrylbdm='0' and b.scbz=0 and a.scbz=0

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from (select a.qyid qyid,a.ryid ryid,a.cyrybh cyrybh,a.xm xm,a.gwmc gwmc from t_qyryxx a ,t_qyjbxx b where a.qyid=b.qyid and b.scbz=0 and a.scbz=0 and a.zxbz=0
order by $pageSort$) z) x where rowno >$beginRow$ and rowno <= $endRow$
select count(1) a from t_qyryxx a ,t_qyjbxx b where a.qyid=b.qyid and b.scbz=0 and a.scbz=0 and a.zxbz=0

select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from (select a.xzdxzqh xzdxzqh,a.xzdxzqhdm xzdxzqhdm, a.ryid ryid, a.qyid qyid, a.cyrybh cyrybh, a.cyrylbdm cyrylbdm, a.xm xm, a.xbdm xbdm, a.xb xb, a.zjhm zjhm, a.gwbh gwbh, a.gwmc gwmc, b.qybm qybm, b.qymc qymc, b.gxdwbm gxdwbm, b.gxdwmc gxdwmc from t_qyryxx a, t_qyjbxx b where 1 = 1 and a.qyid = b.qyid and a.scbz=0 and a.zxbz='0' and b.scbz=0
b.gxdwbm like '$deptCode$%'
order by $pageSort$) z) x where rowno >$beginRow$ and rowno <= $endRow$

select count(1) a from t_qyryxx a, t_qyjbxx b where 1 = 1 and a.qyid = b.qyid and a.scbz=0 and a.zxbz='0' and b.scbz=0
b.gxdwbm like '$deptCode$%'

select a.xzdxzqh xzdxzqh,a.xzdxzqhdm xzdxzqhdm,a.qyid qyid,a.ryid ryid,a.hylbdm hylbdm,a.hylb hylb,a.cyrybh cyrybh,a.cyrylbdm cyrylbdm,a.cyrylbmc cyrylbmc,a.xm xm,a.qm qm,a.bm bm,a.xmpy xmpy,a.gjdm gjdm,a.gj gj,a.mzdm mzdm,a.minzu minzu,a.xbdm xbdm,a.xb xb,a.csrq csrq,a.hyzkdm hyzkdm,a.hyzk hyzk,a.shengao shengao,a.tizh tizh,a.hjdxzqh hjdxzqh,a.hjdxzqhdm hjdxzqhdm,a.hjdxz hjdxz,a.cyzjdm cyzjdm,a.cyzj cyzj,a.zjhm zjhm,a.zzzhm zzzhm,a.zzdz zzdz,a.gwbh gwbh,a.gwmc gwmc,a.gwzrms gwzrms,a.shouji shouji,a.lxdh lxdh,a.jjlxr jjlxr,a.jjlxrdh jjlxrdh,a.gzdm gzdm,a.gz gz,a.zhiwu zhiwu,a.rzrq rzrq,a.cyryztdm cyryztdm,a.cyryzt cyryzt,a.zxr zxr,a.zxbz zxbz,a.zxsj zxsj,a.lrsj lrsj,a.lrr lrr,a.lrdwbm lrdwbm,a.lrdwmc lrdwmc,a.hcdw hcdw,a.hcr hcr,a.hcsj hcsj,a.zxyy zxyy,a.zkzt zkzt,a.bcsj bcsj,a.dcbs dcbs,a.bz bz,a.scbz scbz,a.biduiflag biduiflag,a.zpwtgyy zpwtgyy,a.zt zt ,a.lzrq ,a.djrq djrq,a.cylbdm cylbdm,a.cylb cylb, b.ywx ywx,b.ywm ywm,b.wgrjyxkz wgrjyxkz,b.qzzldm qzzldm,b.qzhm qzhm,b.zatlq zatlq,b.qfjg qfjg,b.rjrq rjrq,b.rjka,rjka ,a.xxdm,a.xx ,a.whcd,a.whcddm from t_qyryxx a ,t_wgcyryxx b where scbz=0 and zxbz=0 and a.qyid=b.qyid(+) and a.ryid=b.ryid(+)
order by a.qyid,a.ryid
sqlMap.update: update t_qyryxx a set a.lzrq=#lzrq:TIMESTAMP# , a.cyryzt=#cyryzt# , a.cyryztdm=#cyryztdm# where a.qyid=#qyid# and a.scbz=0 and a.zxbz=0
sqlMap.select:
select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from (select a.xzdxzqh xzdxzqh,a.xzdxzqhdm xzdxzqhdm,a.ryid ryid,a.qyid qyid,a.cyrybh cyrybh,a.cyrylbdm cyrylbdm, a.xm xm,a.gjdm gjdm,a.gj gj,a.xbdm xbdm,a.xb xb, a.zjhm zjhm,a.cylb cylb,a.cylbdm cylbdm,a.hylbdm hylbdm,a.hylb hylb, a.zt zt,b.qymc qymc from t_qyryxx a ,t_qyjbxx b,t_wgcyryxx c where 1=1 and a.qyid=b.qyid and a.ryid=c.ryid(+) and a.scbz=0 and a.zxbz='0' and b.scbz=0
a.xm like '%$xm$%'
b.qybm like '%$qybm$%'
b.qymc like '%$qymc$%'
a.xbdm =#xbdm#
a.zjhm =#zjhm#
c.ywx like '%$ywx$%'
c.ywm like '%$ywm$%'
a.hylbdm =#hylbdm#
b.qyid =#qyid#
to_number(a.zt) < 90 and to_number(b.zt) < 90
1=1
order by $pageSort$) z) x where rowno >$beginRow$ and rowno <= $endRow$

select count(1) a from t_qyryxx a ,t_qyjbxx b,t_wgcyryxx c where 1=1 and a.qyid=b.qyid and a.ryid=c.ryid(+) and a.scbz=0 and a.zxbz='0' and b.scbz=0
a.xm like '%$xm$%'
b.qybm like '%$qybm$%'
b.qymc like '%$qymc$%'
a.xbdm =#xbdm#
a.zjhm =#zjhm#
c.ywx like '%$ywx$%'
c.ywm like '%$ywm$%'
a.hylbdm =#hylbdm#
b.qyid =#qyid#
to_number(a.zt) < 90 and to_number(b.zt) < 90
1=1
select a.ryid ryid from t_qyryxx a where a.cyrylbdm='0' and a.zt in ('1','4','5') and a.scbz=0
